name: Frogis FI-SUB6P
headline: Ultra-compact 6" installation subwoofer
description: Discrete 6-inch passive subwoofer for tight architectural spaces that still need real low-end support.
story: FI-SUB6P is built for joinery, banquettes and soffits where there’s no tolerance for bulky boxes, but background music still deserves a proper bass foundation.
definition: Ultra-compact passive subwoofer for space-critical architectural and hospitality installations.
specs: Optimised for tight enclosures and boundary loading
Passive operation with external DSP amplification
Compact cabinet footprint for hidden placement

lifestyle.caption: A small-footprint sub that tucks under joinery and seating.

lifestyle.alt: FI-SUB6P angled view showing compact depth

name: Frogis FI-SUB10P
headline: 10" passive subwoofer with compact footprint
description: Passive 10-inch installation subwoofer offering strong low-end performance from a compact, décor-friendly cabinet.
story: FI-SUB10P balances footprint and output, ideal for lounge bars, restaurants and clubs where the system needs authority without oversized enclosures.
definition: Compact 10" passive subwoofer for fixed installation and professional audio systems.
specs: 10" long-throw driver in optimised vented enclosure
Passive operation via external amplifier and DSP
Integrated hardware for floor or tucked-away placement

lifestyle.alt: FI-SUB10P front view highlighting grille design
FI-SUB10P perspective view showing cabinet profile

name: Frogis FI-SUB10A
headline: 10" active installation subwoofer
description: Active 10-inch installation subwoofer with integrated amplification, tuned for plug-and-play pairing with Frogis tops and arrays.
story: FI-SUB10A keeps electronics and cabinet in one package, streamlining smaller projects where outboard amps aren’t justified but sonic standards still are.
definition: Compact active 10" installation subwoofer with built-in amplification and system controls.
specs: Onboard amplifier with system presets for Frogis tops
Balanced line-level inputs and link outputs

lifestyle.alt: FI-SUB10A active subwoofer front and side view
lifestyle.caption: Integrated amplification keeps cabling and rack space minimal.

lifestyle.alt: FI-SUB10A angled view showing enclosure proportions

name: Frogis FI-SUB12IP
headline: Outdoor 12" IP-rated subwoofer
description: Weather-resistant 12-inch subwoofer for outdoor and semi-outdoor applications, engineered to survive the elements without sacrificing headroom.
story: FI-SUB12IP extends Frogis bass performance onto terraces, pool decks and promenades, where sunlight, rain and humidity are part of the brief.
definition: IP-rated outdoor 12" installation subwoofer with weatherised enclosure and hardware.
applications: Covered promenades and theme park zones
specs: Suitable for low-impedance and transformer-line systems
Engineered drainage and sealing for outdoor mounting

lifestyle.alt: FI-SUB12IP angled view showing coated enclosure

name: Frogis FI-SUB12P
headline: High-performance 12" passive subwoofer
description: Professional 12-inch passive subwoofer delivering solid, controlled low end for live and installation systems.
story: FI-SUB12P is the workhorse sub — compact enough for typical stages and rooms, powerful enough to anchor serious full-range systems.
definition: High-performance 12" passive subwoofer for rental and fixed installations.
applications: Fixed installs needing compact yet strong LF
specs: Pole-mount and stacking options with compatible tops

lifestyle.alt: FI-SUB12P front view in black finish

name: Frogis FI-SUB12A
headline: Active 12" DSP-controlled subwoofer
description: Active 12-inch subwoofer with integrated amplification and DSP, voiced to partner Frogis tops and arrays as a turnkey low-frequency module.
story: FI-SUB12A takes the FI-SUB12P acoustic platform and adds a carefully tuned amplifier/DSP engine, simplifying deployment while preserving headroom.
definition: Professional active 12" DSP-controlled subwoofer for live and installation systems.
drivers: 12" high-performance driver with built-in DSP amplification
applications: Performance venues without external amp racks
specs: Control panel with level, phase and filter options

lifestyle.caption: A self-powered 12" module voiced to slot under Frogis arrays and tops.

name: Frogis FI-SUB18A
headline: High-output 18" active subwoofer
description: High-output 18-inch active subwoofer for large rooms, live stages and venues demanding deep, authoritative low end.
story: FI-SUB18A is designed as the foundation for Frogis full-scale systems, delivering concert-style impact in a self-powered package.
definition: Large-format 18" active subwoofer with high-power amplification and system DSP.
specs: High-power amplifier module with integrated DSP
Designed to stack and array with main systems
Rugged cabinet for touring and permanent installs

lifestyle.alt: FI-SUB18A front view showing 18-inch grille area
FI-SUB18A angled view in professional black finish
FI-SUB18A rear panel with amplifier and connectors
lifestyle.caption: High-power amplifier plate with DSP and connection panel.

name: Frogis FS-SUB12P
headline: 12" passive subwoofer voiced for FS slimline systems
description: Installation 12-inch passive subwoofer tuned to complement FS slimline arrays and columns.
story: FS-SUB12P extends FS systems into full-range territory while keeping the same visual language and compact footprint as the column tops.
definition: 12" passive subwoofer optimised as a low-frequency partner to FS slimline arrays.
applications: Fixed installs using FS series arrays
specs: Enclosure proportions matched to FS visual language
Passive operation via external amplifier and DSP
Stacking and placement options under FS arrays

lifestyle.alt: FS-SUB12P form factor matched with FS systems

name: Frogis FS-SUB12A
headline: Active 12" subwoofer for FS slimline systems
description: Self-powered 12-inch FS-series subwoofer with integrated amplification, designed as a plug-and-play LF module beneath FS arrays.
story: FS-SUB12A lets FS-based systems stay minimal: power in, signal in, and the column rig gains a controlled, extendable low-frequency foundation.
definition: Active 12" FS-series subwoofer with onboard amplifier and FS-voiced presets.
specs: Preset voicings aligned to FS column loudspeakers
Rear panel controls for level and crossover

lifestyle.alt: FS-SUB12A active subwoofer matched to FS arrays
lifestyle.caption: Active FS-series sub module sized to disappear under slimline columns.

name: Frogis FS-SUB15P
headline: 15" passive subwoofer for larger FS rigs
description: Large-format 15-inch passive subwoofer giving FS systems extra headroom and low-end authority for bigger spaces.
story: FS-SUB15P is the natural progression when FS-based rooms get larger and the low end needs to stay relaxed at higher levels.
definition: 15" passive FS-series subwoofer for high-output installations.
applications: FS column systems in big halls
specs: Cabinet tuned as a high-headroom partner to FS arrays
Passive drive from external power amplifiers
Stacking and deployment with multiple FS tops

name: Frogis FS-SUB15A
headline: Active 15" FS-series subwoofer
description: High-output active 15-inch FS-series subwoofer with onboard amplification for flagship FS column and array systems.
story: FS-SUB15A anchors the largest FS deployments, pairing a powerful 15-inch platform with a tuned amplifier/DSP engine for effortless, extended LF.
definition: Active 15" FS-series subwoofer with high-power amplification and system DSP.
drivers: 15" high-power driver with integrated amplifier module
applications: Large rooms needing deep, controlled bass from FS rigs
specs: Onboard DSP for crossover, protection and alignment
Rear panel control for level, phase and filters

lifestyle.caption: The largest FS-series subwoofer, built to underpin full-scale slimline systems.
